exam.question: Many pure metals have little use because they are too soft, rust too easily, or have some other ______.

answer.explain: 句意： 很多纯金属用处并不大， 因为它们太软， 很容易生锈， 或者还有其他一些缺点。handicap： 阻碍， 妨碍； bruise： 擦伤， 打伤； blunder： 做错， 失误。

sentences.sContent: It’s a great city – the only drawback is the weather.
sentences.sCn: 这是座很不错的城市，唯一的不足就是天气。

sentences.sContent: ...What is said to be a drawback of the three-year college program...

remMethod.val: draw(拉) ＋ back(向后) → 拖后腿 → 缺点； 不利条件

trans.tranCn: 缺点， 欠缺； 不利条件
trans.tranOther: a disadvantage of a situation, plan, product etc
